name: codegenapp-integrated
description: Integrated AI Development Workflow Platform with Grainchain, Graph-sitter, Web-eval-agent, and Codegen SDK

scripts.backend:start: cd backend && python -m gunicorn main:app -c gunicorn.conf.py
scripts.frontend:start: cd frontend && npm run build && npm run preview
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend && npm run install:integrated
scripts.install:integrated: npm run install:grainchain && npm run install:graph-sitter && npm run install:web-eval && npm run install:codegen-sdk
scripts.install:grainchain: pip install git+https://github.com/Zeeeepa/grainchain.git || echo 'Grainchain install failed - will use mock'
scripts.install:graph-sitter: pip install git+https://github.com/Zeeeepa/graph-sitter.git || echo 'Graph-sitter install failed - will use mock'
scripts.install:web-eval: uvx --from git+https://github.com/Zeeeepa/web-eval-agent.git playwright install || echo 'Web-eval-agent install failed - will use mock'
scripts.install:codegen-sdk: pip install git+https://github.com/Zeeeepa/codegen-api-client.git || echo 'Codegen SDK install failed - will use mock'
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env && npm run setup:db
scripts.setup:db: cd backend && python -m alembic upgrade head || echo 'Database setup skipped'
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend && npm run test:integration
scripts.validate: npm run validate:services && npm run validate:integration
scripts.cicd:full: npm run setup && npm run validate && npm run test && npm run test:web-eval

author: Zeeeepa
